original_text: Then Micaiah said, ‘So now listen to the Lord's message! I saw the Lord as he was sitting on his throne. The great crowd of his angels in heaven were standing around him, on his right side and on his left side.
korean_text: 미가야가 이르되 그런즉 왕은 여호와의 말씀을 들으소서 내가 보니 여호와께서 그의 보좌에 앉으셨고 하늘의 만군이 그의 좌우편에 모시고 섰는데

sentences.original_text: So now listen to the Lord's message
as he was sitting on his throne
The great crowd of his angels in heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 하늘에 있는 그의 천사들의 큰 무리가

sentences.original_text: on his right side and on his left side
